name: Window Choice
overview: Our customers choose Window Choice because we provide warranty and service along with consistent pricing and a personal touch. With no pressure tactics, or gimmicks Window Choice delivers a high level of service with pricing that has always been extremely competitive. The owners are accessible and the products are reliable. YOU should choose Window Choice because we explain your windows and doors in straightforward terms while taking the risk of installation out of your hands. With Window Choice you don’t pay until your job is completed. This includes installation, cleanup, disposal and delivery. We look forward to your business.
